series_description: This series consists of an index of records transferred into the State Records Center by Records Center Client. Series includes an accession or transfer number, transferring agency, brief description, volume transferred and the date accepted. Log is used to assign transfer numbers.
retention_statement: Retain in agency 50 years after data entry, then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of a table recording the location and identification of all boxes stored in the State Records Center or Archives and other relevant supporting tables.
retention_statement: Retain until item permanently removed from inventory, then delete entry. Disposal reporting onCertificate of Records Disposal(RM-3 form) not required.

series_description: This series documents staff administration, supervision or oversight of contractors or vendors providing supplies, services or equipment to the State Records Center.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after expiration of contract, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents the history of Records Center contacts with its customers. Series may include, but is not limited to, correspondence, itemized bills, records of other services provided and related supporting documentation.
retention_statement: Retain 10 years after end of fiscal year, then purge and destroy.

series_description: This series consists of a history of records destroyed or returned by the State Records Center. Series includes Destruction Certificates, Transfer Forms and other supporting documentation.
retention_statement: After 5 years after disposal of records, then purge and transfer internally for Records Center storage. Retain in Records Center for 45 years. Total retention 50 years, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents the repair and service of equipment installed or used by Records Center staff.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after disposal of equipment, then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of agency requests for return of records and/or production of copies of records. Includes requests where records have been returned to storage location.
retention_statement: Retain 25 years after last action, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series consists of agency requests for return of records and/or production of copies of records. Includes requests where records have not been returned to storage location.
retention_statement: Upon refilling of record, transfer the related request to records series 005412, "File Retrieval Requests – Closed".

series_description: This series consists of a collection of manufacturer prepared safety sheets required by
retention_statement: Retain until permanent removal or disposal of related hazardous material, then destroy. Disposal reporting on Certificate of Records Disposal (RM-3 form) not required.
legal_citation: 29CFR1910.1020 to be on hand wherever hazardous materials are transported, stored or used.

series_title: Material Safety Training This series consist of records documenting safety training, including training in the use of hazardous materials and mechanized or electrical equipment, and required certifications.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after employee departure, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents the receipt of records currently in the custody of the State Records Center. This series consists of Records Transfer and Receipt Forms or substitutes and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: Retain until all items on transfer have been destroyed and/or permanently transferred out of Records Center, then transfer to records series 005410, Disposal Files with all related Certificates of Record Disposal and related documentation attached.

series_description: This series consists of reports that document the entry of data into or out of Records Center databases through the use of barcode scanners.
retention_statement: Retain 1 year after report date, then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of requests for pickup, delivery or transfer of records or other items by Records Center Staff.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after action completed, then destroy.
